trans-unit.source: Represents one or more errors that occur during application execution.
trans-unit.target: 表示在应用程序执行过程中发生的一个或多个错误。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.AggregateException> is used to consolidate multiple failures into a single, throwable exception object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.AggregateException> 用于将多个故障整合到单个可引发的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: It is used extensively in the [Task Parallel Library (TPL)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-parallel-library-tpl.md) and [Parallel LINQ (PLINQ)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/parallel-linq-plinq.md).
trans-unit.target: 在广泛使用[任务并行库 (TPL)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-parallel-library-tpl.md)和[并行 LINQ (PLINQ)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/parallel-linq-plinq.md)。

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see the [Aggregating Exceptions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=259617) entry in the .NET Matters blog.
trans-unit.target: 有关其他信息，请参阅[聚合异常](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=259617).NET 之所以重要博客中的条目。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [NIB: How to: Handle Exceptions Thrown by Tasks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6c47ec8-9de9-4880-beb3-ff19ae51565d) and [How to: Handle Exceptions in a PLINQ Query](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-handle-exceptions-in-a-plinq-query.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 处理由任务引发异常](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6c47ec8-9de9-4880-beb3-ff19ae51565d)和[如何： 处理 PLINQ 查询中的异常](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-handle-exceptions-in-a-plinq-query.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example catches the <xref:System.AggregateException> exception and calls the <xref:System.AggregateException.Handle%2A> method to handle each exception it contains.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例捕获<xref:System.AggregateException>异常和调用<xref:System.AggregateException.Handle%2A>方法以处理它包含每个异常。

trans-unit.source: Compiling and running the example with the first `task1` variable should result in an <xref:System.AggregateException> object that contains an <xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 编译并运行该示例与第一个`task1`变量应导致<xref:System.AggregateException>对象，其中包含<xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException>异常。

trans-unit.source: Commenting out that line, uncommenting the second `task1` variable, and compiling and running the example produces an <xref:System.AggregateException> object that contains an <xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 注释掉该行，取消注释第二个`task1`变量和编译和运行示例生成<xref:System.AggregateException>对象，其中包含<xref:System.IndexOutOfRangeException>异常。

trans-unit.source: All public and protected members of <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 所有公共和受保护成员<see cref="T:System.AggregateException" />是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用由系统提供的用于描述错误的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息，如描述错误，将新实例的属性"System.AggregateException： 发生了一个或多个错误。"

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.AggregateException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.AggregateException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with references to the inner exceptions that are the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 用对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: An element of <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> 的元素为 Null。

trans-unit.source: The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with references to the inner exceptions that are the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 用对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: An element of <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> 的元素为 Null。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的描述错误的消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.AggregateException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.AggregateException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="info" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: The exception could not be deserialized correctly.
trans-unit.target: 无法正确反序列化异常。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with a specified error message and references to the inner exceptions that are the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定错误信息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: An element of <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> 的元素为 Null。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.AggregateException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.AggregateException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="innerException" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerException" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exceptions that are the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with a specified error message and references to the inner exceptions that are the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定错误信息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: An element of <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerExceptions" /> 的元素为 Null。

trans-unit.source: Flattens an <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> instances into a single, new instance.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 实例平展入单个新实例。

trans-unit.source: A new, flattened <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的平展 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" />。

trans-unit.source: If a task has an attached child task that throws an exception, that exception is wrapped in an <xref:System.AggregateException> exception before it is propagated to the parent task, which wraps that exception in its own <xref:System.AggregateException> exception before it propagates it back to the calling thread.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个任务具有引发异常的附加的子任务，该异常包装在<xref:System.AggregateException>异常传播到父任务，将该异常包装在自己之前<xref:System.AggregateException>异常之前将其传播回调用线程。

trans-unit.source: In such cases, the <xref:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions%2A> property of the <xref:System.AggregateException> exception that is caught by the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait*>, <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method contains one or more <xref:System.AggregateException> instances, not the original exceptions that caused the fault.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，<xref:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions%2A>属性<xref:System.AggregateException>由捕获异常<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Wait*>，<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAny%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WaitAll%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法包含一个或多个<xref:System.AggregateException>实例，不是原始的异常，导致错误。

trans-unit.source: To avoid having to iterate over nested <xref:System.AggregateException> exceptions, you can use the <xref:System.AggregateException.Flatten%2A> method to remove all the nested <xref:System.AggregateException> exceptions, so that the <xref:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.AggregateException> object contains the original exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 为了避免必须循环访问嵌套<xref:System.AggregateException>例外情况之外，你可以使用<xref:System.AggregateException.Flatten%2A>方法删除所有嵌套<xref:System.AggregateException>异常，以便<xref:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.AggregateException>对象包含原始异常。

trans-unit.source: This method recursively flattens all instances of <xref:System.AggregateException> exceptions that are inner exceptions of the current <xref:System.AggregateException> instance .
trans-unit.target: 此方法以递归方式将平展的所有实例<xref:System.AggregateException>是当前的内部异常的异常<xref:System.AggregateException>实例。

trans-unit.source: The inner exceptions returned in the new <xref:System.AggregateException> are the union of all the inner exceptions from exception tree rooted at the current <xref:System.AggregateException> instance.
trans-unit.target: 在新的内部异常返回<xref:System.AggregateException>异常树中的所有内部异常的联合位于当前是否<xref:System.AggregateException>实例。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, nested <xref:System.AggregateException> instances are flattened and handled in just one loop.
trans-unit.target: 在下面的示例中，嵌套 <xref:System.AggregateException> 实例已经平展，并且仅在一个循环中处理。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.AggregateException.Flatten%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to rethrow the inner exceptions from multiple <xref:System.AggregateException> instances thrown by multiple tasks in a single <xref:System.AggregateException> instance, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 还可以使用 <xref:System.AggregateException.Flatten%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 方法，通过多个任务在一个 <xref:System.AggregateException> 实例中抛出的多个 <xref:System.AggregateException> 实例重新抛出内部异常，如下面的示例所示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> that is the root cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" />，它是此异常的根本原因。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> that is the root cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" />，它是此异常的根本原因。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="info" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="info" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: The predicate to execute for each exception.
trans-unit.target: 每个异常要执行的谓词。

trans-unit.source: The predicate accepts as an argument the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> to be processed and returns a Boolean to indicate whether the exception was handled.
trans-unit.target: 该谓词作为要处理的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 的参数并返回一个布尔值以指示是否处理了该异常。

trans-unit.source: Invokes a handler on each <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> contained by this <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" />.
trans-unit.target: 在每个由此 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 包含的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 上调用处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Each invocation of the `predicate` returns true or false to indicate whether the <xref:System.Exception> was handled.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用`predicate`，则返回 true 或 false 以指示是否<xref:System.Exception>已处理。

trans-unit.source: After all invocations, if any exceptions went unhandled, all unhandled exceptions will be put into a new <xref:System.AggregateException> which will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 在所有调用后任何异常未处理，如果所有未经处理的异常将会放入新<xref:System.AggregateException>将引发。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.AggregateException.Handle%2A> method simply returns.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.AggregateException.Handle%2A>方法只返回。

trans-unit.source: If any invocations of the `predicate` throws an exception, it will halt the processing of any more exceptions and immediately propagate the thrown exception as-is.
trans-unit.target: 如果的任何调用`predicate`引发异常，它将暂停的更多的异常处理，并立即传播引发的异常-是。

trans-unit.source: Ordinarily, an exception handler that catches an <xref:System.AggregateException> exception uses a `foreach` loop (in C#) or `For Each` loop (in Visual Basic) to handle each exception in its <xref:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 通常，异常处理程序捕获<xref:System.AggregateException>异常使用`foreach`循环 （在 C# 中) 或`For Each`循环 （在 Visual Basic 中) 来处理每个异常中的其<xref:System.AggregateException.InnerExceptions%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the following example uses the <xref:System.AggregateException.Handle%2A> method to handle each exception, and only re-throws exceptions that are not `CustomException` instances.
trans-unit.target: 相反，下面的示例使用<xref:System.AggregateException.Handle%2A>方法以处理每个异常，并且不是仅重新引发的异常`CustomException`实例。

trans-unit.source: The following is a more complete example that uses the <xref:System.AggregateException.Handle%2A> method to provide special handling for an <xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException> when enumerating files.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用的更完整示例<xref:System.AggregateException.Handle%2A>方法以提供对特殊处理<xref:System.UnauthorizedAccessException>枚举文件时。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="predicate" /> argument is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="predicate" /> 参数为 null。

trans-unit.source: An exception contained by this <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> was not handled.
trans-unit.target: 未处理此 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 包含的异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> instances that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 获取导致当前异常的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 实例的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of the <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> instances that caused the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 返回导致当前异常的 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 实例的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the current <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回当前 <see cref="T:System.AggregateException" /> 的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 当前异常的字符串表示形式。
